targets.rawSql: SELECT TOP 10 ContractID, SUM(Duration_Total) / 3600.0 as duration_hours FROM DM_ContractAnalytics WHERE DateValue >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) GROUP BY ContractID ORDER BY duration_hours DESC

SELECT DateValue as time, Duration_TruyenHinh / 3600.0 as TruyenHinh FROM DM_ContractAnalytics WHERE DateValue >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) AND ContractID = '$contract' GROUP BY DateValue, Duration_TruyenHinh ORDER BY DateValue

SELECT DateValue as time, Duration_PhimTruyen / 3600.0 as PhimTruyen FROM DM_ContractAnalytics WHERE DateValue >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) AND ContractID = '$contract' GROUP BY DateValue, Duration_PhimTruyen ORDER BY DateValue

SELECT TOP 20 ContractID, SUM(TotalDevices) as TotalDevices, SUM(Duration_Total) / 3600.0 as TotalDuration_Hours, SUM(Duration_TruyenHinh) / 3600.0 as TH_Hours, SUM(Duration_PhimTruyen) / 3600.0 as PT_Hours, SUM(Duration_GiaiTri) / 3600.0 as GT_Hours FROM DM_ContractAnalytics WHERE DateValue >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) GROUP BY ContractID ORDER BY TotalDuration_Hours DESC

list.name: contract
list.label: Contract
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ContractID FROM DM_ContractAnalytics ORDER BY ContractID
